# replaceAll(with:)

**Instance Method**

Replace all data in the buffer with new bytes.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func replaceAll(with bytes: some DataProtocol)
```

## Parameters

- **bytes**: The replacement data. This must have the same `count` as the block buffer.
title: replaceAll(with:)
